extendedInfo.description: Bloglovinâ for Android helps you follow all your favorite blogs & discover new ones.Features:- Add any blog on the web that you want to follow- Google reader users! You can import all your blogs and folders- See all their latest posts gathered in a beautiful feed- Discover the best posts in Fashion, Beauty, Interior Design, Food, DIY and other categoriesSee why over 2 million members already love bloglovinâ!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: App freezes, force closes, says it can\'t find Web browser to view page.....please fix!
reviews.author: Theresa Unruh

reviews.title: Needs Notifications
reviews.comment: Please for the love of whatever deity you believe in, ADD NOTIFICATIONS. >:(
reviews.author: Cat M

reviews.title: Not synchronized on pc and on android
reviews.comment: I can\'t see comments on posts, why I have to go on original blog? Also, huge problem is why account is not synchronized for example if I add blog to follow on my computer I will have to add it on my phone also, why does not update new blogs automatically? Change that and it will be five stars.
reviews.author: Jelena Kolarski

reviews.title: I miss google reader
reviews.comment: This app was working fine until today, and now it\'s not updating. Not showing new posts even when I refresh. It does the job, but I miss reader.
reviews.author: Sarah WhitehouseNews

reviews.comment: that it was eady to import the blogs I follow. Do prefer mobile site. Just want to see recent blog posts I haven\'t read. Also think the categories should have education as an option.\tLike that it was easy to import the blogs I follow. Do prefer actual website. Just want to see recent blog posts I haven\'t read. Also think the categories should have education as an option.
reviews.author: Rebekah Quiles

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works perfectly fine:) except some of the images are blurry!
reviews.author: Lauren Tobin

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I really wish this app was a little better. I don\'t appreciate not getting full content in posts and really wish I didn\'t have to click through to do that or comment. I feel like, on my tablet, using bookmarks and visiting my favorite blogs daily might just be a better use of my time.
reviews.author: Danielle Ganley

reviews.title: It does not work
reviews.comment: It always freeze and skip blog slow to come up. Please fix
reviews.author: Jackie Harrison

reviews.title: Broken images
reviews.comment: It keeps on failing to load all images in a post!!
reviews.author: Cicilia Fabiola

reviews.comment: Was working excellent until the past 2 days
reviews.author: Prissy Contreras

reviews.title: Missing a lot of features
reviews.comment: The ability to sort by folder, like how it is on the website is necessary. The ability to sort by date is also needed , or oldest to newest, etc. We should also be able to see blog followers and manage that from the app as well.
reviews.author: Tamara Ford

reviews.title: Needs an update
reviews.comment: Keeps sending me the same email over and over finally had to unsubscribe. It will not refresh the page and shows me stuff from a month ago. Please fix this app. Until then im uninstalling.
reviews.author: TerrynHeather Balch

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: But wish there was an app option for my kindle, so I could read bloglovin on my kindle fire. Make that happen and I would be one happy girl.
reviews.author: Leann Luckett

reviews.title: doesnt work at all
reviews.comment: Former version was terrible but at least useable. The new one is simplly CRAPPY. Loved bloglovin but decided to move on and fortunately I found Feedly...anyways farewell Bloglovin.
reviews.author: Odile Chan

reviews.title: Not loading
reviews.comment: Page doesn\'t load on startup anymor
reviews.author: alison mellin

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I tried to leave feedback through the app, but it didn\'t seem to work. When you click on the form, it doesn\'t bring up the keyboard to leave a message, so forced to leave this via from the google play store. It could be better by allowing folders/categories through the app as you can online. Also, when I press back, it doesn\'t automatically exit the app -- have to select exit, which seems redundant. And if we could have landscape scrolling, that would be great!
reviews.author: LINA WONG

reviews.title: Great reader...great app
reviews.comment: Wish it seperated them into categories I\'ve created like on the mobile site.
reviews.author: Christy Skinner

reviews.title: Love your desktop version but...
reviews.comment: your app sucks! Where the hell are my folders?!?
reviews.author: Stephina Waldon

reviews.title: Can\'t Love More?
reviews.comment: Dear bloglovin\', I love you, but why you no let me love more blogs? You can type in the search field but return/enter doesn\'t work, so we can\'t search.
reviews.author: Rosanna Brady

reviews.title: Doesn\'t search
reviews.comment: The search feature does nothing, I put in a blog name or subject and hit enter and nothing happens.
reviews.author: Riad El-Azem
